DOC.brief_summary: The study clinical evaluation counter ( OTC ) combination product contain paracetamol ( 500 mg ) , dimethindene maleate ( 1 mg ) , phenylephrine hydrochloride ( 10 mg ) compare paracetamol ( 500 mg ) alone treatment nasal congestion , rhinorrhea , sneeze symptom due upper respiratory tract infection ( URTI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Tablets Paracetamol , Dimethindene Maleate Phenylephrine Hydrochloride Reducing Symptoms Common Cold Flu
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : â€¢ acute URTI , diagnose health care professional study site , follow symptom start within 72 hour screening/baseline Visit : nasal congestion , sneeze , rhinorrhea . Exclusion criterion : Use investigational drug within 30 day 10 halflives enrollment , whichever longer . History known hypersensitivity study drug , excipients drug similar chemical class . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
